medical_note: Patient reports joint pain and facial rash after sun exposure. Labs show positive ANA and leukopenia. Malar rash noted on exam.
Patient presents with fatigue, hyperpigmentation, and orthostatic hypotension. Labs show hyponatremia and hyperkalemia.
Patient notes resting tremor and slow movement. Mild cogwheel rigidity on exam. Family reports reduced facial expression.
Patient describes abdominal bloating and weight loss. Iron deficiency anemia present. Symptoms improve with gluten avoidance.
